p: DNA methylation in newborns from women who were given n-3 FA supplementation during late pregnancy has been evaluated in a few clinical trials [ 91]. DNA methylation changes following six-week supplementation with 3 g of n-3 FAs supplementation in 36 overweight and obese subjects showed that 308 CpG sites involved in inflammatory and immune response, type 2 diabetes, lipid metabolism, and cardiovascular signaling were differentially methylated after the intervention [ 92].
